mapper.sql: id, name, description, version, provider, architecture, app_class, type, industry, icon_file_id, guide_file_id, app_create_type, create_time, user_id, user_name, status, mep_host_id
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_application (id, name, description, version, provider, architecture, app_class, type, industry, icon_file_id, guide_file_id, app_create_type, create_time, user_id, user_name, status) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{version}, #{provider}, #{architecture}, #{appClass}, #{type}, #{industry}, #{iconFileId}, #{guideFileId}, #{appCreateType}, now(), #{userId}, #{userName}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_application SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, version = #{version}, provider = #{provider}, architecture = #{architecture}, app_class = #{appClass}, type = #{type}, industry = #{industry}, icon_file_id = #{iconFileId}, guide_file_id = #{guideFileId}, app_create_type = #{appCreateType} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, version, provider, architecture, app_class, type, industry, icon_file_id, guide_file_id, app_create_type, to_char(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as create_time, user_id, user_name, status, mep_host_id FROM tbl_application

SELECT id, name, description, version, provider, architecture, app_class, type, industry, icon_file_id, guide_file_id, app_create_type, to_char(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as create_time, user_id, user_name, status, mep_host_id FROM tbl_application
and user_id = #{userId}
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
order by create_time desc

SELECT id, name, description, version, provider, architecture, app_class, type, industry, icon_file_id, guide_file_id, app_create_type, to_char(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as create_time, user_id, user_name, status, mep_host_id FROM tbl_application where id = #{id}
